name: @pattern-lab/starterkit-handlebars-vanilla
description: Pattern Lab Vanilla StarterKit for Handlebars.
author: Brad Frost

scripts.prepublish: npm install node-sass && npm install node-sass-glob-importer && node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-glob-importer/dist/cli.js -o dist/css dist/css/style.scss
